msg: Adding correct error handling when relaying s2s stanzas

author: stefan2
msg: SVN's Adler-32 implementation is relatively bad at larger buffers.
ZLIB already provides a very good implementation for that and
its next will possible include the new SSE2 implementation for
(ADLER_MOD_BLOCK_SIZE): drop because it's no longer needed
(svn_diff__adler32): make it faster for shorter buffers;
